attributes.action: The Government should financially support Tata Steel, via nationalisation
attributes.additional_details: Tata Steel is one of the world’s most geographically diversified steel producers, with operations in 26 countries and commercial offices in over 35 countries.
attributes.background: Cameron says the government is "doing everything it can" to save thousands of steel jobs - but there were "no guarantees of success". Unions and opposition say the government is in "chaos", and want action . Tata Steel's UK business directly employs 15,000 workers and supports thousands of others
